name: Apex Fungal
description: A towering behemoth of pulsing, iridescent fungal growth, the Apex Fungal dominates the cityscape. Its form is vaguely humanoid, but warped and twisted by a grotesque array of symbiotic fungi that coat its body in bioluminescent patterns. Two colossal fangs protrude from its lower jaw, dripping with an acidic ichor. The air around it shimmers with spores, choking anyone who dares to approach.
dialogue: Your flesh will feed the mycelium!
You cannot stop what is inevitable...
Ssss... you will become one with me...
(A wet, clicking sound as its fangs move)
(Low, rumbling laughter echoing through the city)

flavor.rationale: An unknown anomaly ripped a hole in reality above Neo-Kyoto. From this tear flowed an alien fungal growth that rapidly consumed everything it touchedâ€”plants, animals, and even inorganic materials. The Apex Fungal emerged as the apex of this infestation, its mind fused with the collective intelligence of the fungi. It sees humanity as nothing more than fuel for its own expansion, a vessel to spread its spores across the world.
